articles.title: Secret Service 'aware' of Elon Musk post about Harris and Biden - BBC.com
articles.description: The tech tycoon has deleted the post about assassination attempts on the president and vice-president, saying it was a joke.
articles.content:
The US Secret Service says it is "aware" of a social media post by Elon Musk in which he said that "no one is even trying" to assassinate President Joe Biden or Vice-President Kamala Harris. 
Mr Mus… [+1985 chars]
